short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Play Flappy Bird right from the toolbar for quick, addictive fun with simple controls and challenging gameplay.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
How to Play

To get started, open the popup window by pressing the action button on the toolbar (after installation, the extension icon is hidden on the extensions popup). Use the spacebar to make your bird float and navigate through the obstacles. The goal is to pass through as many gaps between the pipes as possible without hitting them or the ground. The longer you survive, the higher your score!

Instructions:

Spacebar: Press the spacebar to make the bird float upwards. Release the spacebar to let the bird descend.
Avoid Obstacles: Steer clear of the pipes and other obstacles to keep your bird in the air.
Collect Power-Ups: Keep an eye out for power-ups that can give you an edge in the game.
